name: European Association for Specialty Yeast Products
membership: Eurasyp does not make part of any membership of any association / (con) federation/networks or other bodies.
goal:
EURASYP is a non-profit European Industry Association founded in February, 2003. EURASYP represents the political and economic interests of the seven leading producers of specialty yeast products in Europe and its associate members. Together they provide the majority of the European market with a broad range of yeast-based ingredients.
The association’s goal is to ensure the global representation and defense of the common interests of its members:
-to represent, protect and defend their collective rights and interests
- to find solutions for questions of common interest to producers of “yeast products”
- to propose measures or adopt a common position where deemed necessary
- to develop the profession and its communication to stakeholders
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Food Flavouring Regulation 1334/2008, Food Additives Regulation 1333/2008, Organic Regulations 848/2018, Labelling Regulation 1169/2011, Food Enzymes Regulation 1332/2008
